ghostPost.title: Drinks with Canadians in SF, January 2020
ghostPost.excerpt: We're hosting a meetup in SF on Wed Jan29th at Southern Pacific Brewing. Fission & Headphones.com invite you to find out more about our teams and what we're building.
ghostPost.custom_excerpt: We're hosting a meetup in SF on Wed Jan29th at Southern Pacific Brewing. Fission & Headphones.com invite you to find out more about our teams and what we're building.
ghostPost.twitter_description: Meet Fission and Headphones.com, visiting SF from Vancouver, Canada. Drinks and appies on us at Southern Pacific Brewing. Click through to register.

ghostPost.plaintext:
Brooke and Boris are heading down to San Francisco, along with our friend Andrew
from Headphones.com [https://headphones.com]. We're traveling for some meetings
and want to connect with ex-pat Canadians in the area, along with other friends,
acquaintances, and interesting Bay Area locals. So, we're hosting a Drinks with
Canadians  event the week of Jan 27th while we're in town.

Please come out and meet us if you're interested in what we're building, the
(brief) story of our companies and how we're growing, or even if you just like
friendly Canadians :) Founders, developers, audiophiles â€“ you're all welcome to
attend.

Join us at Southern Pacific Brewing [https://www.southernpacificbrewing.com/] 
on Wednesday, January 29th, from 6pm to 9pm. Craft beer and appies are on us,
please do sign up for a ticket below to let us know you're coming ðŸ‘‡

Let us know you're coming!
Sign up on the ticketing page directly Â»
[https://ti.to/fission/drinks-with-canadians-sf-2020/]
ghostPost.html:
Brooke and Boris are heading down to San Francisco, along with our friend Andrew from Headphones.com. We're traveling for some meetings and want to connect with ex-pat Canadians in the area, along with other friends, acquaintances, and interesting Bay Area locals. So, we're hosting a Drinks with Canadians event the week of Jan 27th while we're in town.

Please come out and meet us if you're interested in what we're building, the (brief) story of our companies and how we're growing, or even if you just like friendly Canadians :) Founders, developers, audiophiles â€“ you're all welcome to attend.

Join us at Southern Pacific Brewing on Wednesday, January 29th, from 6pm to 9pm. Craft beer and appies are on us, please do sign up for a ticket below to let us know you're coming ðŸ‘‡
